features: Upgraded Cyclone System: The Eureka PowerSpeed is now upgraded with new cyclone technology to handle larger debris, smaller dirt, and even microscopic dust.Specific uses:hard floor,carpet,dual action
Powerful pick-up: Penetrates deep into the carpet to extract embedded dirt, dust, and debris.
Lightweight: PowerSpeed does all the work while still remaining lightweight.
5 Height Settings: The PowerSpeed works well on carpets, shag rugs, and hard floors. Its wheels run smoothly on hardwood floors to prevent scratches or gouges.

Multiple accessories included: A quick-release handle is connected to the stretch hose for above-floor cleaning. A 7-inch-long crevice tool, dusting brush, and upholstery tool help clean hard-to-reach areas. Extract dirt, and pet hair, and freshen up your car, curtains, ceilings, or door frames. For your convenience, they are all stored right on board.

Warning: When you use the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirts. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt to remove the hairs and dirts every 2 weeks. If the roller and belt not cleaned for a long time, it may cause malfunction, and in some serious cases, there may be the risk of smoke and belt broken.
Traps 99.9% of dust, dander and allergens
body.description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.The Eureka Lightweight Powerful Upright Vacuum is the perfect addition to your cleaning arsenal! With upgraded cyclone technology, it provides powerful suction for carpets, rugs, and hardwood floors.It's lightweight and five height settings designed for multi-surfaces make cleaning a breeze. Perfect for pet owners, this vacuum comes equipped with multiple accessories to clean hard-to-reach areas, while its large capacity dustbin and washable filter bring less time emptying and more time cleaning.Versatile enough to clean cars, ceilings, lampshades, and furniture, this handheld vacuum is an apartment essential and a must-have for any home. Get yours today and experience the best vacuum cleaner for carpets and floors at an incredible cheap price!If you have any questions, contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886.Warning: When using the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirt. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt every 2 weeks.Long-term failure to clean may cause malfunction, or even risk of smoke and belt broken.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eureka PowerSpeed Bagless Upright Features 5 Height Adjustment Settings Just turn the dial to clean low to medium pile carpet, plush, high pile rugs and hard floors. Powerful Suction Make cleaning a breeze with powerful suction to pick up both larger messes and small debris. Lightweight As Always Eureka knows that the weight of your vacuum matters! This PowerSpeed vacuum delivers the same powerful suction with less weight(11Lbs), keeping it easy to move throughout your home.

Easy Empty Dust Cup Emptying the dust cup is as easy as pushing a button. Clean Anywhere Vacuum floors, upholstery, stairs, and other hard-to-reach areas in your home with the included accessories which are all stored on the vacuum. Quick Release Handle For easy above floor cleaning with up to 7 feet of extended reach. Accessory Storage All accessories can be stored right on your vacuum for easy access when cleaning. Easy Empty Dust Cup Clean Anywhere Quick Release Handle Accessory Storage

Intuitive Assembly Insert the handle, secure the hose and you are good to go! Quick Cleanup The 12.6" wide nozzle helps you clean more in less time. Zero Maintenance Costs The bagless design and washable filters make maintenance easy.

Eureka PowerSpeed NEU182B Eureka PowerSpeed NEU181A Eureka PowerSpeed No Loss of Suction NEU280 Eureka PowerSpeed Cord Rewind NEU202 Vacuum Belts for NEU280 Replacement Filter for NEU280 Weight 10 lbs 10 lbs 11 lbs 12.3 lbs Dust Cup Capacity 2.6 L 2.6 L 1.9 L 2.1 L Cord Length 25ft 25ft 25ft 25ft Cleaning Path 12.6" 12.6" 12.6" 12.6" Nozzle Height Adjustment ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Pet Turbo Brush ✓ ✓ Upgraded Cyclone ✓ LED Lights & Clear Brush Roll Window ✓ Automatic Cord Rewind ✓ Accessories Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Upholstery Tool Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Upholstery Tool, Pet Turbo Brush Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Upholstery Tool Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Upholstery Tool, Pet Turbo Brush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good value - great suction
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum picked up a disturbing amount of dirt versus my cordless vac on the carpet in my bedrooms.Pros:- Suction, very powerful- Ease of use: tool storage, easy to empty bin, washable filter, handle for carrying- Weight is not bad- Adjustable height for different floor typesCons:- Very loud with an irritating high pitched whistleCould be better:- Wand hose is on the short side- Slightly longer power cord would be betterI'm happy with this purchase. The superior cleaning more than makes up for the inconvenience of having a cord especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Vacuum that Works Really Well
reviews.reviewText: I would definitely recommend this Eureka vacuum as it is super lightweight which I really appreciate and does a great job cleaning. Also, the attachments are very useful and work very well. The suction on this vacuum is amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's sucks good, but also sucks bad
reviews.reviewText: Needed a 'real' vacuum for those times my cordless vacs aren't appropriate--like stairs, cracks/crevices, under appliances, or cobwebs, etc.Pros: light weight, good suction, dirt cup is easy to release and empty, & has onboard tools. Seems to pick up pet hair nicely.Cons:Power cord is way too short. I live in a small house, but still had to change outlets from one end of my livingroom to the other to be able to vacuum the whole room. Make sure you have an easy to access outlet in every room, or a handy extension cord.The hose is also way too short and extremely stiff. There are no hose 'extension tubes' to give it more length, so above the head cleaning is impossible unless you want to lift the entire unit in the air. Same with stairs--be prepared to lift the whole unit every 2-3 steps.The crevice tool is too short and too fat to be of much use other than in-between furniture cushions or easy to access baseboards and the like. It can't fit more than 3 inches under or between any appliances, unless you move the entire appliance. I expect it won't reach very far under/between car seats either.If a long hose and useful tools aren't important to you, this may be ok for you, as the suction capabilities are good. I'm going to keep searching for my next vacuum...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New house - New vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Moved into a new house past September and needed a new vacuum as the previous I had for almost 10 years. This was easy to assemble and is very powerful. Picked up A LOT the first time and continues to do a great job with cleaning. I don't have stairs but I do have hardwood and carpet and works fine on both. Great suction with the wand as well for the behind areas like couches and tv as well as base boards. Highly recommend this!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazed at the quality for the price point
reviews.reviewText: I don't care how much you spend on a cordless, they're just not going to work like this little gem. Great product. I'm amazed at the quality for the price.Suction is excellent, Easy to use with tool storage, very easily emptied waste can, filter is washable, reasonable in weight. Good range of height adjustment for floors/carpets. Generous cord. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Eureka ! You have found it ! Another way to make a great product affordable. Thank you. You made it light weight making it easy to maneuver around corners. This baby can find more dirt. Even better than a politician’s opponent. The only thing I can say about it on the flip side. The high pitch sound it produces. But I get it. It’s due to the engineering. Like a leaf blower. If you want the power, then you get use to the sound. If not, ear buds or some good tunes might help. Other than that I would recommend it. I’m hoping this first round of Mrs. Doubtfiring around the house will have more sequels than Lucas films. Oh, the power cord has plenty of length. Pretty much like listening to celebrities award speeches. Or my review, wink. For an average sized home with average sized rooms. Thank you again Eureka for living up to your name.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cons outweigh the pros
reviews.reviewText: While this vacuum has decent suction and is easy to empty, if I had to do over, I'd spend more money for a better vacuum. Yes, it lightweight (easy to carry up the stairs) but if you are using the attachment tools don't expect it to stay upright. The stretch hose is too short so when you pull on it the least little bit, the vacuum tips over. Forget trying to vacuum your stairs with this thing. The electrical cord is SO SHORT. No going from 1 room to another without changing outlets. And the canister is too small especially if you have pets that shed.If you live in a very small apartment or house, and cost is a factor, then this may be for you. But if not, I suggest you look for a better model. Sometimes being cheaper is too cheap. This one is going to the garage and I'll find a better one (more pros than cons) for my upstairs vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent all around!
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is fantastic!Great price, easy to set up, super easy to use!Suction power is well above average!
Es muy potente y limpia bien los pelos de mis mascotas
Muy bonito diseño! Pero no corre bien el rodillo sobre la alfombra! Se batalla mucho!

Lo único es que ya llevo 3 con esta, sacan hasta el alma en las alfombras, eso me encanta, y más que tengo un peroo y 3 gatos y pelos hay hasta donde no se imaginan, así que casi diario lo tengo que hacer, lo que si es que salen ya muy delicadas, cuidado si te salen piedras, fierros como algún tornillo, o algo parecido porque es cuando el motor empieza a dañarse y no hay manera de arreglarlas, las hacen casi casi desechables, es una pena porque Eureka por años ha tenido fama de muy buenas aspiradoras, solo cuidenla mucho no es para uso rudo.
Probably the best vacuum I've had.The pet attachment works very well, easy to move and carry.Emptying is easy.

My daughter did her research and discovered this vacuum cleaner. Her thinking was to check the 3-star reviews on all the vacuum cleaners and those will tell you what, if anything, is wrong with the product. Then she read the 4-star and 5-star reviews and was impressed so she bought this one. She loved how light and easy it was to use along with the strong suction. She vacuumed one room and filled the canister.She told her mom who told me about it. I read the 5-star reviews myself and was compelled to buy this vacuum and test it for myself, thinking, how could such a low-priced vacuum cleaner be so good? So, I vacuumed our bedroom with our higher-end Kenmore upright, which I thought was quite decent, and then followed by using this Eureka vacuum. Well, I filled half a canister with fine dust, fluff, and hair. Wow!So, I bought one for my mother-in-law and vacuumed her family room a few hours after she vacuumed it. She noticed her carpet was looking newer since the carpet fibres were standing up (from the suction). I examined the canister which was 3/4 full, and saw some fluff, a little hair but a lot of fine dust and what looked like super fine sand. She was impressed and since she had trouble with her elbow she loved how light and easy it was to use.So, Eureka has 3 loyal customers. Great design and engineering on this powerful and easy-to-use vacuum cleaner. To those who find it difficult to push, set the carpet pile one notch higher. You have to realize that with super suction comes a little effort to push but pulling is super easy. You can't have great suction without a little effort. Just remember to go slowly forward and backward to let the vibration and suction do their thing.In my opinion, this does a better job than $800 (even $2000) vacuum cleaners so I'm planning on buying a spare (or two) soon!
